Class.name: DocBook.UI.BannerInfo
Class.Description: Information used to draw the banner on the various DocBook HTML pages.

Property.name: booktitle
Property.Description: Book title displayed for this page

Property.name: next
Property.Description: id of next page (or "" if none)

Property.name: prev
Property.Description: id of previous page (or "" if none)

Property.name: isArticle
Property.Description: This page is in the KnBase
